madhyawediyaku nangu prashnayata pilithuru dun sajith premadasa manthriwaraya, agramathya dhuraya bharaganna lesa janadhipathiwaraya thamanta arayum kalada widhimath aanduwak kriyathmaka wanawita nisi kramawedayanta, widhimath wada piliwelakata anuwa prathipaththi garukawa katayuthu kala yuthu nisath, nayakayan depala athara samaya ha sanhindiyawa shakthimath kala yuthu nisath ema arayuma karunikawa prathikshepa kala bawa sandahan kaleya.
